product_name: AlpineAire Western Tamale Pie with Beef - 2 Servings
long_description: Enjoy a tasty Tex-Mex meal on your next adventure with the AlpineAire Western Tamale Pie with Beef meal. Includes blue corn meal, sweet corn, beef and sharp cheddar cheese, among other ingredients, to fill you up after a long day on the trail. To prepare, simply open the pouch, remove the oxygen absorber, add 2 cups of boiling water to the pouch, stir and let stand for 10 - 12 min. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy a tasty Tex-Mex meal on your next adventure with the AlpineAire Western Tamale Pie with Beef meal.
